rpgonline.noise

Class SimplexNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.noise.SimplexNoise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Noise

    public class SimplexNoise
extends java.lang.Object
implements Noise
    An implementation of simplex noise.
    Author:
    Tomas
    See Also:
    SimplexNoise

    • Field Detail

      • SEED_AREA

        public static final double SEED_AREA
        The size of the seeds effect on the noise offset. Setting this too high will cause artifacts to appear due to the limits of double values.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
